channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: VCF And Private AI Take Center Stage At VMware Explore 2025
item.description: Broadcom CEO Hock Tan's keynote at the event portrayed private cloud as the foundation of the transformed enterprise, where IT enables innovation, esp...

item.title: Kremlin-Mandated Messaging App Constantly Spies On Users
item.description: Security researchers found that Max, which Russia will require to be pre-installed on all phones, is designed to track users, confirming fears the app...

item.title: The Wiretap: Networks Of Foreign Scammers Are Extorting American Kids
item.description: Sextortion is killing American teenagers and often the scammers are part of sprawling criminal operations.

item.title: Study: Medicare Pays Physicians One-Third Less Than Decade Ago
item.description: Physicians are paid 33.6% less for treating Medicare patients than a decade ago thanks to reimbursement cuts coupled by rising practice expenses, a ne...

item.title: How Would An AI Recession Impact AI Commercialization?
item.description: An AI recession will lead to far more focused use of AI in ways that will enhance value for businesses and increase the effectiveness of employees.

item.title: Mirrors and hats

item.title: “GET OUTTA MY WAY”

item.title: Centering
